author: Trish Deseine
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/160C Fan/Gas 4. Rub a gratin dish with the cut side of the garlic and then grease it with half of the butter. Place the potatoes in layers in the dish. Season each layer with salt and pepper and sprinkle lightly with grated nutmeg. Mix together the milk and cream, warm and pour over the potatoes. Dot the remaining butter over the top. Bake in the oven for 1Â¼ hours.  Increase the heat to 200C/180C Fan/ Gas 6 and leave to cook for another 15 minutes in order to brown the top nicely.
ingredients: 1 garlic clove, halved,  50g/2oz butter,  1kg/2lb 4oz waxy potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced.,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste,  nutmeg, for grating,  250ml/9fl oz milk,  250ml/9 fl oz single cream
